conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model correctly interprets the 2D architectural lines as structural volumes with defined height and thickness.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric projection and clean cutaway geometry. Multiple wall surfaces are visible.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity. Wall positions, room adjacencies, and partitions (including the separate garage) are strictly maintained. Minor window scale variation.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and bathroom fixtures are correctly localized. Bedroom furniture is absent, replaced by carpet textures.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Walls and floors are clearly distinguished. No textual contamination.

detected_errors.description: Missing beds and living room furniture indicated by floor plan labels.

summary: A highly accurate 3D transformation that preserves the exact floor plan layout and architectural proportions in a clean isometric style.
